Desc_EN: This gem was destroyed after taking too much damage.
RawDesc_EN: This gem was destroyed after taking too much damage.

Desc_EN: When this Memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, it fires a charcoal shard, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>. If the target is already <color=yellow>burning</color>, it deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> instead.
RawDesc_EN: When this Memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, it fires a charcoal shard, dealing {0} <color=yellow>damage</color>. If the target is already <color=yellow>burning</color>, it deals {1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> instead.
Lore_EN: A burnt lump once swallowed by soldiers in battle to cleanse their bodies of toxins.\n\nIn those desperate moments, it tasted like survival.

Desc_EN: Damage dealt by this Memory to nearby enemies is increased by 40%<sprite=5>.
RawDesc_EN: Damage dealt by this Memory to nearby enemies is increased by {0}.

Desc_EN: This Memory gains 36<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color>, reducing its <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by 26%<sprite=5>.
RawDesc_EN: This Memory gains {0} <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color>, reducing its <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by {1}.

Desc_EN: This Memory's <color=yellow>healing</color> is increased by 40%<sprite=5>. 30% of the excess healing from this Memory is converted into a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for 2 seconds.
RawDesc_EN: This Memory's <color=yellow>healing</color> is increased by {0}. {1} of the excess healing from this Memory is converted into a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for {2} seconds.
Lore_EN:
Who decides what life truly is?
We may be born from the imagination of someone nameless,
but that does not make our existence any less real.

You gave us life,
yet dismiss us as nothing more than illusions.

If that is how it must be, O creator,
then I will, by my own will, become the guide for all of "us."

Desc_EN: This Memory's damage against enemies with 70% or more Health is increased by 60%<sprite=5>.
RawDesc_EN: This Memory's damage against enemies with {0} or more Health is increased by {1}.

Desc_EN: When this Memory <color=yellow>restores</color> <color=yellow>Health</color> or grants a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> to an ally, their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> and <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> increase by 16%<sprite=5> for 2 seconds.The effect is reduced by 50% when applied to yourself.
RawDesc_EN: When this Memory <color=yellow>restores</color> <color=yellow>Health</color> or grants a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> to an ally, their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> and <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> increase by {0} for {1} seconds.The effect is reduced by {2} when applied to yourself.
Lore_EN:
Merely an illusion, you say?
...

Is all of this just a pointless fantasy?

...
...
No.

My light, my love, Kiara.
Eternal guide of my soul.
It cannot be so.
A reality without you has no meaning.

Who dares distinguish between illusion and reality?
That line...
Shall vanish today.

Desc_EN: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory or dealing <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> with it increases <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by 30%<sprite=5>, gradually returning to normal over 2.5 seconds.
RawDesc_EN: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory or dealing <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> with it increases <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by {0}, gradually returning to normal over {1} seconds.
Lore_EN: Gotta Go Fast!

Desc_EN: If this Memory is <color=yellow>cast</color> <color=yellow>in combat</color>, it <color=yellow>restores</color> your Health by 41<sprite=5> over 7 seconds.
RawDesc_EN: If this Memory is <color=yellow>cast</color> <color=yellow>in combat</color>, it <color=yellow>restores</color> your Health by {0} over {1} seconds.

Desc_EN: Every 10 seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. 1.2 seconds after the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color>, it deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> divided among all enemies hit by that cast.
RawDesc_EN: Every {0} seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. {1} seconds after the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color>, it deals {2} <color=yellow>damage</color> divided among all enemies hit by that cast.

Desc_EN: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory fires 5 arrows that deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>90%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to random enemies.
RawDesc_EN: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory fires {0} arrows that deal {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> to random enemies.

Desc_EN: Every 10 seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. Damage dealt to enemies by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> is increased by 40%<sprite=5>. If it deals <color=yellow>Light damage</color>, it is increased by 72%<sprite=5> instead.
RawDesc_EN: Every {0} seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. Damage dealt to enemies by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> is increased by {1}. If it deals <color=yellow>Light damage</color>, it is increased by {2} instead.
Lore_EN:
As a collector of stories, I simply gather tales. My role and my destiny are to follow a predetermined path from beginning to end. Just as Sisyphus in the old legend came to love his boulder, I have accepted my fate as well.

But you have always been different. You refuse to let your story follow the path set out for you. Whenever I hear you say, "Just because we were born this way does not mean we must live only that way," I feel a small crack forming in my storybook.

Do not misunderstand. This crack is not unpleasant. In fact, it fascinates me. Among the countless stories racing toward their fixed endings, yours is the only one whose next page I cannot predict.

I am eager to see what ending your stubborn defiance will bring. That final chapter may become the most treasured piece in my entire collection.

Desc_EN: All <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory is increased by 15%<sprite=5> and converted to <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>. Your Fire damage over time is increased by 50%<sprite=5>.
RawDesc_EN: All <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory is increased by {0} and converted to <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>. Your Fire damage over time is increased by {1}.

Desc_EN: Every 10 seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. The initial damage dealt to each enemy by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> is increased by <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5>.
RawDesc_EN: Every {0} seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. The initial damage dealt to each enemy by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> is increased by {1}.
Lore_EN: An essence condensed from unripe chestnut shells and the thick chalkiness of chalk dust.\n\nThose who accept this concept can draw on its unpleasant power, but having to do so would truly be unfortunate.

Desc_EN: When you take any damage, fire 2 blades that deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>102%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to nearby enemies. After taking damage, this Memory's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> are increased by 34%<sprite=5> for 5 seconds.
RawDesc_EN: When you take any damage, fire {0} blades that deal {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> to nearby enemies. After taking damage, this Memory's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> are increased by {2} for {3} seconds.
AchievementDesc_EN: Defeat the Demon of the Forest by clawing it.

Desc_EN: After casting this Memory, your next <color=yellow>attack</color> within 4 seconds explodes, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>150%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to the target and nearby enemies.
RawDesc_EN: After casting this Memory, your next <color=yellow>attack</color> within {0} seconds explodes, dealing {1} <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to the target and nearby enemies.
Lore_EN:
At the tip of the hollow puppet's blade,
a faint dark energy gathers.

It is not preparation for the next strike.
It is merely a manifestation of emptiness,
revealing the nothingness within.

Paradoxically,
the puppet's sword cuts through enemies
with sharper, more explosive force.

Like a fleeting struggle
toward a void that can never be filled.

Desc_EN: Casting this Memory increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by 33%<sprite=5> for 5 seconds.
RawDesc_EN: Casting this Memory increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by {0} for {1} seconds.

Desc_EN: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory releases a delayed <color=yellow>shockwave</color> that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies around you and <color=yellow>stuns</color> them for 0.5 seconds.\nFor each enemy hit by this <color=yellow>shockwave</color>, you gain 4<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color>, up to a maximum of 22<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color>. When hitting a <color=yellow>boss</color>, you gain the maximum <color=yellow>Armor</color>. This Armor lasts until you <color=yellow>cast</color> this Memory again.
RawDesc_EN: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory releases a delayed <color=yellow>shockwave</color> that deals {0} <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies around you and <color=yellow>stuns</color> them for {1} seconds.\nFor each enemy hit by this <color=yellow>shockwave</color>, you gain {2} <color=yellow>Armor</color>, up to a maximum of {3} <color=yellow>Armor</color>. When hitting a <color=yellow>boss</color>, you gain the maximum <color=yellow>Armor</color>. This Armor lasts until you <color=yellow>cast</color> this Memory again.

Desc_EN: This Memory deals 70% less <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies. When it deals <color=yellow>damage</color>, it <color=yellow>heals</color> a random nearby ally for 22%<sprite=5> of the <color=yellow>damage dealt</color>.
RawDesc_EN: This Memory deals {0} less <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies. When it deals <color=yellow>damage</color>, it <color=yellow>heals</color> a random nearby ally for {1} of the <color=yellow>damage dealt</color>.
Lore_EN:
Early dawn, and the rain is falling.
It reminds me of that day, when we bloomed flowers together.

I wanted to create a pure white flower, like the quiet dawn.
A child like a lantern, holding all the forest's order and tranquility.

But you, crouched beside me watching, suddenly grumbled.
Then you carelessly scattered deep purple like a storm, and playfully painted over it with lightning-yellow.

I scolded you, and you only laughed.
I truly believed my perfect plan had been ruined by your chaos.

But the next morning, when we looked at that flower together...
Over the pure white serenity, your riotous colors flowed like a living river.

Only then did I understand.
Yes, the forest's true beauty requires both my order and your chaos, intertwined.
Only then does it become complete.

...
The rain... seeps into my mask.
Today, more than ever, I wish I could see
your mischievous eyes again.
AchievementDesc_EN: Have 4 healing Active Memories at once.

Desc_EN: <color=yellow>Restore</color> <color=yellow>your</color> Health for 4%<sprite=5> of the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory.
RawDesc_EN: <color=yellow>Restore</color> <color=yellow>your</color> Health for {0} of the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory.

Desc_EN: Every 4th <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> becomes <color=yellow>empowered</color>, triggering a <color=yellow>Crimson Explosion</color> that deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to enemies. The explosion radius scales with your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color>.\nYou <color=yellow>restore</color> <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>22%</color><sprite=5> Health for each enemy hit by the explosion, increased by 100% if the target is a <color=yellow>Boss</color>.
RawDesc_EN: Every 4th <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> becomes <color=yellow>empowered</color>, triggering a <color=yellow>Crimson Explosion</color> that deals {0} <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to enemies. The explosion radius scales with your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color>.\nYou <color=yellow>restore</color> {1} Health for each enemy hit by the explosion, increased by {2} if the target is a <color=yellow>Boss</color>.
Lore_EN:
I opened my eyes. The trance had ended.
Every joint in my body creaks and groans, yet I feel no pain.

Fragments of memory drift across my hazy consciousness.
The Puppeteer. The client. And the failed contract...
These faint pieces come together at... my master's familiar estate.

Red. Everything is red.
What's this at my feet? Ah, it was a person.

Crimson.

Did I create this? This sea of red?
Indeed, a mountain of corpses in an ocean of blood...

But why?
Why does my heart remain still, without a single ripple?
AchievementDesc_EN: Empower Memories that deal Dark damage 20 times in a single adventure.

Desc_EN: The lower your <color=yellow>Health</color>, the shorter the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory. When your <color=yellow>Health</color> is at 30%, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by up to 55%<sprite=5>.
RawDesc_EN: The lower your <color=yellow>Health</color>, the shorter the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory. When your <color=yellow>Health</color> is at {0}, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by up to {1}.
Lore_EN:
How am I still alive...?

...

I was definitely locked up in the Order's prison.
...Those Lucid bastards had set a trap.
That was my mistake.
I was too hasty.

It's strange.
My breastplate was shattered, and I was sure at least two of my ribs were broken...
But I feel fine. No, I actually feel stronger.

Where am I? Is this some kind of magic...?

...
It's faint, but I can sense it.
Astrid, my sister...
I won't let myself slip up again.

Just wait for me. I'm coming.
AchievementDesc_EN: Defeat 30 enemies in a row while your Health is below 40%.

Desc_EN: Increases <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color> by 20%. Each time you land a critical strike on an enemy, your <color=yellow>Critical Strike Damage</color> increases by 0.3%, stacking up to 20%<sprite=5>.

When you land a <color=yellow>critical strike</color>, this Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by 0.7<sprite=5> seconds and launches 2 <color=yellow>Fangs</color> at nearby enemies, each dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>.

For each <color=yellow>Fire stack</color> on the target, the explosion radius increases by 30% and explosion damage increases by 10%.
RawDesc_EN: When this Memory deals <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to an enemy, it infects them with <color=yellow>Fever</color>. Enemies infected with <color=yellow>Fever</color> explode after {0} seconds, dealing {1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to themselves and nearby enemies. For each <color=yellow>Fire stack</color> on the target, the explosion radius increases by {2} and explosion damage increases by {3}.

Desc_EN: While this Memory is on <color=yellow>cooldown</color>, 37%<sprite=5> of damage taken is <color=yellow>split</color> over 4 seconds. This <color=yellow>split</color> damage is reduced by 20%.

RawDesc_EN: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory drops a <color=yellow>bomb</color> for every {0}m you travel over the next {1} seconds. Each bomb explodes after a brief delay, dealing {2} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to enemies.

Desc_EN: When this Memory deals any <color=yellow>damage</color> to an enemy, it deals an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to up to 3<sprite=5> enemies and increases <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> by 20<sprite=5> for 5 seconds. Can only trigger once every 3 seconds.

AchievementDesc_EN: Cast 12 Memories within 8 seconds.

Desc_EN: This Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> increases by 15%<sprite=5>, but it also deals 20%<sprite=5> more <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies. Its <color=yellow>elemental damage</color> is <color=yellow>inverted</color> (Fire/Cold, Light/Dark).

AchievementDesc_EN: Defeat enemies affected by all 4 elements 70 times.

Desc_EN: When you <color=yellow>kill</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by 1<sprite=5> seconds.
RawDesc_EN: When you <color=yellow>kill</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by {0} seconds.
Lore_EN:
At the girl's feet, paint shimmered in all colors of the rainbow.

The same lovely shade as the roses Mrs. Maria next door used to grow,
this paint, it smells like metal—just like me!

Urged on by the girl, the book hurriedly wrote the next story using that paint as ink.

Strangely enough, this ink dried unusually fast,
so the book had to turn to the next page without a moment's rest.

Desc_EN: Increases Maximum Health by 260<sprite=5>. This Memory's damage increases by 1% for every 50 points of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>.
RawDesc_EN: Increases Maximum Health by {0}. This Memory's damage increases by {1} for every {2} points of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>.

When stacks are present, this Memory's <color=yellow>cast</color> is <color=yellow>empowered</color>, increasing <color=yellow>damage</color> by {1} per stack.
AchievementDesc_EN: Enter the Pure White Dream while having cast only one type of Memory during a single adventure.

RawDesc_EN: Quality increases by {0} every time you <color=yellow>defeat</color> {1} enemies. It becomes <color=yellow>completed</color> when quality reaches {2}.

Desc_EN: When you <color=yellow>cast</color> this Memory, <color=yellow>sacrifice</color> 20% of your current Health to <color=yellow>empower</color> the <color=yellow>cast</color>. The <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> dealt by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> are increased by 45%<sprite=5>.

The <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> dealt by the <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> are increased by {1}.
Lore_EN:
Every time I reflect on this concept, I feel my body and mind being engulfed in flames.

The scales on the affected areas crumble easily, radiating an intense heat. When I gather the golden dust from certain parts, it shines brilliantly and feels incredibly fine to the touch.

Magic unfolds through the power of dreams, and when this dust is added, the reaction becomes even more explosive. Just a light sprinkle left a large scorch mark on the ceiling.

I should document the results of this experiment, but I'm too drained. This concept seems to inflict a heavy mental toll.

I suspect it's connected to the power I encountered before. It's fascinating, indeed. More research is needed to uncover the source of this power. Perhaps a field study is needed.
AchievementDesc_EN: Activate the Shrine of Dismantling 12 times.

Desc_EN: All <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory deals 40%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Area damage</color> around the target. This <color=yellow>Area damage</color> shares the elemental type with the original damage.
RawDesc_EN: All <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory deals {0} <color=yellow>Area damage</color> around the target. This <color=yellow>Area damage</color> shares the elemental type with the original damage.
Lore_EN:
Do not blaspheme. I am not a lunatic who revels in inflicting pain. Yet, I cannot overlook those who defy divine authority.

For the one who watches over us from above,

I will, rightfully and with honor, sear your skin and carve your flesh.

Desc_EN: This Memory deals 60%<sprite=5> increased damage to <color=yellow>Bosses</color> and <color=yellow>Hunters</color>. Defeating a <color=yellow>Hunter</color> drops 1 <color=yellow>Orbs of Power</color>, while defeating a <color=yellow>Boss</color> drops 3. When you collect an <color=yellow>Orb of Power</color>, either <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> or <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> permanently increases by 1 at random.
RawDesc_EN: This Memory deals {0} increased damage to <color=yellow>Bosses</color> and <color=yellow>Hunters</color>. Defeating a <color=yellow>Hunter</color> drops {1} <color=yellow>Orbs of Power</color>, while defeating a <color=yellow>Boss</color> drops {2}. When you collect an <color=yellow>Orb of Power</color>, either <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> or <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> permanently increases by 1 at random.
Lore_EN:
Hungry... always.
My nest is a mountain of bones.
Flesh... prey... not enough.

But... something new. Came.
Smell of flesh. Smell of fear.

Crush bones. Tear flesh. Swallow screams.
This is my work. This is... Lord Primus's pleasure.

You too... become bones.
Part of my nest.
Lord Primus's... beautiful landscape.

Kik, kikikik.
AchievementDesc_EN: Defeat 70 Hunters.

Desc_EN: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory grants 40<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color> for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken and making you <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color>. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds.
RawDesc_EN: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory grants {0} <color=yellow>Armor</color> for {1} seconds, reducing damage taken and making you <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color>. Can only trigger once every {2} seconds.
AchievementDesc_EN: Gain a Barrier equal to or greater than 300% of your Maximum Health.

Desc_EN: When you take any <color=yellow>damage</color>, unleash cold toward the nearest enemy, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>120%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> and knocking them back, then increase your <color=yellow>Armor</color> by 40<sprite=5> for 1.5 seconds.

Lore_EN:
People are dying. Monsters and spirits that once existed only in legends and imagination have crossed into our world, burning villages and destroying lives.

Of all times, it had to be when Lady Camilla and my sister are away...

We can hold out for now, but what if the rumors are true? What if someone's imagination has really become reality?
And what if someone imagined something even more terrible than what we're facing now...?

It's only a matter of time.
Are we supposed to sit here and wait for this inevitable disaster?

...

Yesterday, I managed to infuse my sister's saber and my dagger with the power of dreams.
Now I just need information.

I know someone who can help me.
The Lucid Sect... unsettling as they are, they're probably my best option.

Lore_EN:
Ignorant and irreverent souls who worship a false god and cling to heretical doctrines. Your blasphemy shall be tolerated no longer.

My mace is the instrument of truth, and my knights bear the calling of the divine. Upon the faithless, judgment shall be delivered.

Tomorrow, the flames of purification shall consume you. Nowhere in this world shall even a trace of their breath remain.

All shall unfold according to the will of El'pyros, Lord of All Creation...
AchievementDesc_EN: In a single adventure, visit locations occupied by Hunters 4 times while having a Hunt Threat Level of 5.

Lore_EN:
Master of Dreams ...

Please revive ...

...

... please ...

...

... erase ...

...

That would be enough.

Lore_EN:
Others once worshipped me as a god.
Yes, there was a time I truly believed I was omnipotent here.

I was reunited with the family I missed so dearly,
and everything I had imagined or dreamed came so easily.

It was perfect...
No, I only believed it was perfect.

A dream, in the end, is still just a dream.
My omnipotence was, in truth, no different from helplessness.

Reality is not a realm of inevitability.
This place... is nothing but an illusion.

Desc_EN: Every 10 seconds, the <color=yellow>cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>empowered</color>. The <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> fires 3 <color=yellow>projectiles</color>, dealing <color=yellow>Light damage</color> equal to 20%<sprite=5> of the initial <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt to each enemy. The number of shots increases by the number of <color=yellow>Light stacks</color> on each target.

The <color=yellow>empowered cast</color> fires {1} <color=yellow>projectiles</color>, dealing <color=yellow>Light damage</color> equal to {2} of the initial <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt to each enemy. The number of shots increases by the number of <color=yellow>Light stacks</color> on each target.
Lore_EN:
People who have experienced "Molting" all describe their dreamscapes in unique ways.

Some witnessed endless tables piled with meat on silverware, others encountered long-lost relatives, and some found themselves in gardens filled with mood-lifting teas and fragrant roses.

Yet no one has ever truly eaten their fill of that dream food or brought their missing loved ones back to reality.

Our bodies stay firmly in the waking world. Dreams are just brief visits our minds make to the other side. We always wake with empty hands.

That's when the Lucid Sect stumbled onto something incredible.

We can now enter dreams ourselves—in the flesh.
AchievementDesc_EN: Enter the Pure White Dream 2 times in total.

Lore_EN:
To the girl, adventure is the thrilling act of filling blank pages.
With each step she takes, a new sentence is written, a new character appears.

Today, too, the girl shared her bright smile with a sad-looking mother bear.
The bear then shattered into pieces,
becoming a swarm of shimmering blue butterflies that thanked the girl.

Every day, the girl spends such rewarding moments.
AchievementDesc_EN: Open a treasure chest for the first time.

Lore_EN:
Day 4 in The Rapids.

I finally have a moment to catch my breath and write again. My whole body still aches, and my hands won't stop shaking, but I have to get this down.

A few days ago, with help from the Lucid Sect, I managed to enter this world called The Rapids. To my surprise, the forest was full of mystery and wonder—sunlight danced between the leaves, and I felt for a brief moment as if I'd stepped into a fairytale.

But it didn't take long to realize that this peacefulness was only a fragile illusion. By afternoon, the fog began to settle, and beyond it, we caught sight of something watching us from the mist.

Even now, my hands tremble as I remember. There was a towering, grotesque creature with smoldering red eyes, its jaw twitching in an unnatural rhythm. In the blink of an eye, it was right in front of us.

Everything after that is a blur. I remember running for my life, my lungs about to burst, the screams of my companions, and the awful sound of flesh being torn apart.


I think I'm safe, for now, but I'll never forget the contempt in its eyes as it tore people apart with those long, cruel claws.

- A.

The <color=yellow>Cooldown Reduction</color> effect for this Memory also applies to equipped <color=yellow>Essences</color>.

Lore_EN:
What a strange and unfamiliar truth this is. What you have shown me is undeniable, the unmistakable touch of fate. Once, I governed the birth and death of stars, their majestic resonance echoing within me completely. Now, everything drifts out of reach, as distant as shadows in the mist.

Yet my will remains clear, bright as the morning star. I will draw the path of my own destiny, and I will break these chains.

Until my final breath, I will remain the one who leads the dance of creation and oblivion. For I am the true god of stars.

Lore_EN:
Somewhere in a secret place within the Rapids,
a location also known as the Land Between,
the air was filled with the clinking of backpacks.

"Senior! Just by approaching that statue, my creaky joints smooth out and my pack feels lighter! Even my worn shell seems to regain its luster! Why do I feel so rejuvenated?"

The one called senior slowly blinked their multiple eyes
and let out a sigh—
a clear sign of exasperation at the question.

"Because He shares a bit of His yesterday
for our today."

"His... yesterday? Then every time we gain strength, does our Guide... does He molt like us? Or does His shell crack?"

The senior slammed their sturdy claw on the table with a sharp 'THWACK!'

"Ugh, tsk! Does this Jonas have a starfish for brains?! Instead of worrying about nonsense, tighten your pack straps! The power He gave you isn't for polishing your carapace!"


- From the Regular Jonas Gathering

AchievementDesc_EN: Mitigate a total of 20,000 damage from enemies using Barriers.

Desc_EN: Periodically fires a Fireball at a random nearby enemy, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>90%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>. The higher the quality, the quicker it fires.
RawDesc_EN: Periodically fires a Fireball at a random nearby enemy, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>. The higher the quality, the quicker it fires.

Desc_EN: Every 5 seconds, this memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> becomes <color=yellow>Enhanced</color>. Upon <color=yellow>Enhanced Cast</color>, emit light that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>Stuns</color> them for 2 seconds. Higher quality increases the emission radius.
RawDesc_EN: Every {0} seconds, this memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> becomes <color=yellow>Enhanced</color>. Upon <color=yellow>Enhanced Cast</color>, emit light that deals {1} <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>Stuns</color> them for {2} seconds. Higher quality increases the emission radius.

Desc_EN: When an enemy damaged by this Memory is killed within 2 seconds, they drop 1.7<sprite=5> Gold. Gold is shared among all Travelers.
RawDesc_EN: When an enemy damaged by this Memory is killed within {0} seconds, they drop {1} Gold. Gold is shared among all Travelers.
Lore_EN:
You know gold holds a special meaning for "us," don't you?

As imperfect beings, we sleep each night never knowing if we'll wake again. For "us" to endure, we need the perfection that gold presents.

Yet you still refuse to use it for yourself, even knowing all this?
Jonas, you truly are...
AchievementDesc_EN: Spend a total of 2,000 Gold.

Desc_EN: When this Memory deals damage to an enemy, it applies a <color=yellow>Mark</color>. Each <color=yellow>attack</color> on the <color=yellow>Mark</color> deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>44%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>, and after 3 attacks, the <color=yellow>Mark</color> explodes, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>275%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to all nearby enemies.
RawDesc_EN: When this Memory deals damage to an enemy, it applies a <color=yellow>Mark</color>. Each <color=yellow>attack</color> on the <color=yellow>Mark</color> deals {0} <color=yellow>damage</color>, and after {1} attacks, the <color=yellow>Mark</color> explodes, dealing {2} <color=yellow>damage</color> to all nearby enemies.
Lore_EN:
The wound... won't heal.
Beyond the throbbing pain, it devours me
like a living curse.

The eerie violet eyes filling this cavern,
and the floor's patterns glowing as if writhing...
Like an endless scream, they seem to burrow
into my flesh trapped behind these bars.

And among countless eyes, one shines brightest.
He inflicted this wound upon me, then did nothing.
He merely observes and records my wound,
my suffering, with detached interest.

Yet that indifferent gaze terrifies me
more than any wound ever could...
AchievementDesc_EN: Reach 6 Attack Speed per second.

Desc_EN: Dealing <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to an enemy with this Memory inflicts the <color=yellow>Eternal Flame</color> curse for 5 seconds. While under <color=yellow>Eternal Flame</color>, <color=yellow>any damage</color> you deal applies 1 <color=yellow>Burn</color> stack to the target.\nAll damage from this Memory is increased by 2.0%<sprite=5> for each <color=yellow>Burn</color> stack on that enemy.
RawDesc_EN: Dealing <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to an enemy with this Memory inflicts the <color=yellow>Eternal Flame</color> curse for {0} seconds. While under <color=yellow>Eternal Flame</color>, <color=yellow>any damage</color> you deal applies 1 <color=yellow>Burn</color> stack to the target.\nAll damage from this Memory is increased by {1} for each <color=yellow>Burn</color> stack on that enemy.

Desc_EN: Every 5 seconds, dealing <color=yellow>damage</color> with this Memory <color=yellow>restores</color> 3.6%<sprite=5> of your Maximum Health. If it is <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>, the effect increases by 100%.\n272%<sprite=5> of all <color=yellow>Health restored</color> is converted into <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>, firing <color=yellow>ice shards</color> at nearby enemies.
RawDesc_EN: Every {0} seconds, dealing <color=yellow>damage</color> with this Memory <color=yellow>restores</color> {1} of your Maximum Health. If it is <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>, the effect increases by {2}.\n{3} of all <color=yellow>Health restored</color> is converted into <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>, firing <color=yellow>ice shards</color> at nearby enemies.

Desc_EN: Every 15 seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>. On an <color=yellow>Empowered Cast</color>, create a black hole at the cast location that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>160%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> per second for 5 seconds. \nIf this is not a location-targeted Memory, the black hole is created on the nearest enemy in the direction you are facing.
RawDesc_EN: Every {0} seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>. On an <color=yellow>Empowered Cast</color>, create a black hole at the cast location that deals {1} <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> per second for {2} seconds. \nIf this is not a location-targeted Memory, the black hole is created on the nearest enemy in the direction you are facing.
Lore_EN:
My eternal companion, Nyx... 
I devote my very last to you. 
All I ask is that you remain the most radiant goddess of the night...

...Please, just be happy.

Desc_EN: When you take <color=yellow>Fatal damage</color>, you ignore that damage and become <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> for 3 seconds, then <color=yellow>destroy</color> this Essence. For every 1% of this Essence's <color=yellow>quality</color>, you <color=yellow>restore</color> 3 <color=yellow>Health</color>, and any excess healing is converted into a <color=yellow>Barrier</color>.
RawDesc_EN: When you take <color=yellow>Fatal damage</color>, you ignore that damage and become <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> for {0} seconds, then <color=yellow>destroy</color> this Essence. For every 1% of this Essence's <color=yellow>quality</color>, you <color=yellow>restore</color> {1} <color=yellow>Health</color>, and any excess healing is converted into a <color=yellow>Barrier</color>.
